entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
